display_html: data Pred = Predicate (Map StatePart SimpleExpr) FlagStatus StateMuddleStatus
name: Pred Predicate

display_html:
data StatePart
  • = SP_Reg Register
  • | SP_Mem SimpleExpr Int
name: StatePart SP_Reg SP_Mem

display_html:
data SimpleExpr
  • = SE_Immediate Word64
  • | SE_Var StatePart
  • | SE_StatePart StatePart
  • | SE_Malloc (Maybe Int) (Maybe String)
  • | SE_Op Operator [SimpleExpr]
  • | SE_Bit Int SimpleExpr
  • | SE_SExtend Int Int SimpleExpr
  • | SE_Overwrite Int SimpleExpr SimpleExpr
  • | Bottom BotTyp
name: SimpleExpr Bottom SE_Immediate SE_Var SE_StatePart SE_Malloc SE_Op SE_Bit SE_SExtend SE_Overwrite

display_html:
data FlagStatus
  • = None
  • | FS_CMP (Maybe Bool) Operand Operand
name: FlagStatus None FS_CMP

display_html:
data BotTyp
  • = FromNonDeterminism (Set SimpleExpr)
  • | FromPointerBases (Set PointerBase)
  • | FromCall String
  • | FromSources (Set BotSrc)
  • | FromOverlap (Set BotSrc)
  • | FromMemWrite (Set BotSrc)
  • | FromSemantics (Set BotSrc)
  • | FromBitMode (Set BotSrc)
  • | FromUninitializedMemory (Set BotSrc)
name: BotTyp FromSources FromNonDeterminism FromPointerBases FromCall FromOverlap FromMemWrite FromSemantics FromBitMode FromUninitializedMemory

display_html:
data BotSrc
  • = Src_Var StatePart
  • | Src_Malloc (Maybe Int) (Maybe String)
  • | Src_Function String
name: BotSrc Src_Var Src_Malloc Src_Function

display_html:
data Operator
  • = Minus Int
  • | Plus Int
  • | Times Int
  • | And Int
  • | Or Int
  • | Xor Int
  • | Not Int
  • | SetXX
  • | Bsr Int
  • | Div_Rem Int
  • | Div Int
  • | Shl Int
  • | Shr Int
  • | Sar Int
  • | Udiv Int
  • | Ror Int
  • | Rol Int
  • | Bswap Int
  • | Pextr Int
name: Operator Div Not Minus Plus Times And Or Xor SetXX Bsr Div_Rem Shl Shr Sar Udiv Ror Rol Bswap Pextr

display_html:
data PointerBase
  • = StackPointer
  • | Malloc (Maybe Int) (Maybe String)
  • | GlobalAddress Word64
  • | PointerToSymbol Word64 String
  • | Unknown SimpleExpr
name: PointerBase Unknown StackPointer Malloc GlobalAddress PointerToSymbol

display_html:
data CFG = CFG {
  • cfg_blocks :: IntMap [Int]

  • cfg_addr_to_blockID :: IntMap Int
  • cfg_fresh :: Int
  • cfg_instrs :: IntMap [Instr]
}
name: CFG CFG cfg_instrs cfg_fresh cfg_addr_to_blockID cfg_edges cfg_blocks

display_html: type SectionsInfo = [(String, String, Int, Int)]

VerificationResult Unverified VerificationError VerificationUnresolvedIndirection VerificationSuccesWithAssumptions VerificationSuccess

display_html: type Postconditions = Set (NodeInfo, Pred)
name: Postconditions

display_html:
data MemWriteIdentifier
  • = MemWriteFunction String Int StatePart
  • | MemWriteInstruction Int Address SimpleExpr
name: MemWriteIdentifier MemWriteInstruction MemWriteFunction

display_html:
data VerificationCondition
  • = Precondition SimpleExpr Int SimpleExpr Int
  • | Assertion SimpleExpr SimpleExpr Int SimpleExpr Int
  • | FunctionConstraint String Int [(Register, SimpleExpr)] (Set StatePart)
  • | SourcelessMemWrite MemWriteIdentifier
name: VerificationCondition SourcelessMemWrite FunctionConstraint Assertion Precondition

display_html: type FInit = Map StatePart SimpleExpr
name: FInit

display_html:
data Context = Context {
  • ctxt_dump :: IntMap Word8
  • ctxt_syms :: IntMap String
  • ctxt_sections :: SectionsInfo
  • ctxt_dirname :: String
  • ctxt_name :: String
  • ctxt_generate_pdfs :: Bool
  • ctxt_entries :: Graph
  • ctxt_cfgs :: IntMap CFG
  • ctxt_calls :: IntMap FReturnBehavior
  • ctxt_invs :: IntMap Invariants
  • ctxt_posts :: IntMap Postconditions
  • ctxt_inds :: Indirections
  • ctxt_finits :: IntMap FInit
  • ctxt_vcs :: IntMap VCS
  • ctxt_results :: IntMap VerificationResult
  • ctxt_recursions :: IntMap IntSet
}
name: Context Context ctxt_recursions ctxt_results ctxt_vcs ctxt_finits ctxt_inds ctxt_posts ctxt_invs ctxt_calls ctxt_cfgs ctxt_entries ctxt_generate_pdfs ctxt_name ctxt_dirname ctxt_sections ctxt_syms ctxt_dump
